review: I originally bought the Roku device and had a lot of problems with the streaming. After reading many reviews on the Amazon Fire TV, I decided to return the Roku and buy the Amazon device. I'm very glad I did. We have been enjoying Amazon for over 2 weeks now and love it! The quality and selection of movies, TV shows, and apps is incredible. The voice control button is a welcome feature. We have had no problems streaming movies or TV shows. The Amazon device allows you to download you tube and connect your cell phone so you can choose a movie on your phone and watch it on the TV. This comes in handy when having to search for teh right show or movie to watch.
author: Karen L. Holloway
